And Adam<S>120</S> knew<S>3045</S> <S>853</S> Eve<S>2332</S> his wife<S>802</S>; and she conceived<S>2029</S>, and bare<S>3205</S> <S>853</S> Cain<S>7014</S>, and said<S>559</S>, I have gotten<S>7069</S> a man<S>376</S> from<S>854</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>Cain: that is, Gotten, or, Acquired</sup>
And she again<S>3254</S> bare<S>3205</S> his brother<S>251</S> Abel<S>1893</S>. And Abel<S>1893</S> was a keeper<S>7462</S> of sheep<S>6629</S>, but Cain<S>7014</S> was a tiller<S>5647</S> of the ground<S>127</S>. <sup>Abel: Heb. Hebel</sup> <sup>a keeper: Heb. a feeder</sup>
And in process<S>7093</S> of time<S>3117</S> it came to pass, that Cain<S>7014</S> brought<S>935</S> of the fruit<S>6529</S> of the ground<S>127</S> an offering<S>4503</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>in process: Heb. at the end of days</sup>
And Abel<S>1893</S>, he<S>1931</S> also brought<S>935</S> of the firstlings<S>1062</S> of his flock<S>6629</S> and of the fat<S>2459</S> thereof. And the LORD<S>3068</S> had respect<S>8159</S> unto Abel<S>1893</S> and to his offering<S>4503</S>: <sup>flock: Heb. sheep, or, goats</sup>
But unto Cain<S>7014</S> and to his offering<S>4503</S> he had not respect<S>8159</S>. And Cain<S>7014</S> was very<S>3966</S> wroth<S>2734</S>, and his countenance<S>6440</S> fell<S>5307</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto Cain<S>7014</S>, Why art thou wroth<S>2734</S>? and why is thy countenance<S>6440</S> fallen<S>5307</S>?
If<S>518</S> thou doest well<S>3190</S>, shalt thou not be accepted<S>7613</S>? and if thou doest not well<S>3190</S>, sin<S>2403</S> lieth<S>7257</S> at the door<S>6607</S>. And unto thee shall be his desire<S>8669</S>, and thou shalt rule<S>4910</S> over him. <sup>be accepted: or, have the excellency</sup> <sup>unto: or, subject unto thee</sup>
And Cain<S>7014</S> talked<S>559</S> with<S>413</S> Abel<S>1893</S> his brother<S>251</S>: and it came to pass, when they were in the field<S>7704</S>, that Cain<S>7014</S> rose up<S>6965</S> against<S>413</S> Abel<S>1893</S> his brother<S>251</S>, and slew him<S>2026</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto Cain<S>7014</S>, Where<S>335</S> is Abel<S>1893</S> thy brother<S>251</S>? And he said<S>559</S>, I know<S>3045</S> not: Am I my brother's<S>251</S> keeper<S>8104</S>?
And he said<S>559</S>, What<S>4100</S> hast thou done<S>6213</S>? the voice<S>6963</S> of thy brother's<S>251</S> blood<S>1818</S> crieth<S>6817</S> unto me from the ground<S>127</S>. <sup>blood: Heb. bloods</sup>
And now art thou cursed<S>779</S> from the earth<S>127</S>, which hath opened<S>6475</S> her mouth<S>6310</S> to receive<S>3947</S> thy brother's<S>251</S> blood<S>1818</S> from thy hand<S>3027</S>;
When<S>3588</S> thou tillest<S>5647</S> the ground<S>127</S>, it shall not henceforth<S>3254</S> yield<S>5414</S> unto thee her strength<S>3581</S>; a fugitive<S>5128</S> and a vagabond<S>5110</S> shalt thou be in the earth<S>776</S>.
And Cain<S>7014</S> said<S>559</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, My punishment<S>5771</S> is greater<S>1419</S> than I can bear<S>5375</S>. <sup>My: or, Mine iniquity is greater than that it may be forgiven</sup>
Behold, thou hast driven me out<S>1644</S> this day<S>3117</S> from the face<S>6440</S> of the earth<S>127</S>; and from<S>5921</S> thy face<S>6440</S> shall I be hid<S>5641</S>; and I shall be a fugitive<S>5128</S> and a vagabond<S>5110</S> in the earth<S>776</S>; and it shall come to pass<S>1961</S>, that every one that findeth me<S>4672</S> shall slay me<S>2026</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto him, Therefore<S>3651</S> whosoever slayeth<S>2026</S> Cain<S>7014</S>, vengeance shall be taken<S>5358</S> on him sevenfold<S>7659</S>. And the LORD<S>3068</S> set<S>7760</S> a mark<S>226</S> upon Cain<S>7014</S>, lest<S>1115</S> any finding<S>4672</S> him should kill<S>5221</S> him.
And Cain<S>7014</S> went out<S>3318</S> from the presence<S>6440</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and dwelt<S>3427</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Nod<S>5113</S>, on the east<S>6926</S> of Eden<S>5731</S>.
And Cain<S>7014</S> knew<S>3045</S> his wife<S>802</S>; and she conceived<S>2029</S>, and bare<S>3205</S> Enoch<S>2585</S>: and he builded<S>1129</S> a city<S>5892</S>, and called<S>7121</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, after the name<S>8034</S> of his son<S>1121</S>, Enoch<S>2585</S>. <sup>Enoch: Heb. Chanoch</sup>
And unto Enoch<S>2585</S> was born<S>3205</S> Irad<S>5897</S>: and Irad<S>5897</S> begat<S>3205</S> Mehujael<S>4232</S>: and Mehujael<S>4232</S> begat<S>3205</S> Methusael<S>4967</S>: and Methusael<S>4967</S> begat<S>3205</S> Lamech<S>3929</S>. <sup>Lamech: Heb. Lemech</sup>
And Lamech<S>3929</S> took<S>3947</S> unto him two<S>8147</S> wives<S>802</S>: the name<S>8034</S> of the one<S>259</S> was Adah<S>5711</S>, and the name<S>8034</S> of the other<S>8145</S> Zillah<S>6741</S>.
And Adah<S>5711</S> bare<S>3205</S> Jabal<S>2989</S>: he was the father<S>1</S> of such as dwell<S>3427</S> in tents<S>168</S>, and of such as have cattle<S>4735</S>.
And his brother's<S>251</S> name<S>8034</S> was Jubal<S>3106</S>: he was the father<S>1</S> of all such as handle<S>8610</S> the harp<S>3658</S> and organ<S>5748</S>.
And Zillah<S>6741</S>, she also bare<S>3205</S> Tubalcain<S>8423</S>, an instructer<S>3913</S> of every artificer<S>2794</S> in brass<S>5178</S> and iron<S>1270</S>: and the sister<S>269</S> of Tubalcain<S>8423</S> was Naamah<S>5279</S>. <sup>instructer: Heb. whetter</sup>
And Lamech<S>3929</S> said<S>559</S> unto his wives<S>802</S>, Adah<S>5711</S> and Zillah<S>6741</S>, Hear<S>8085</S> my voice<S>6963</S>; ye wives<S>802</S> of Lamech<S>3929</S>, hearken<S>238</S> unto my speech<S>565</S>: for I have slain<S>2026</S> a man<S>376</S> to my wounding<S>6482</S>, and a young man<S>3206</S> to my hurt<S>2250</S>. <sup>I have: or, I would slay a man in my wound, etc</sup> <sup>to my hurt: or, in my hurt</sup>
If<S>3588</S> Cain<S>7014</S> shall be avenged<S>5358</S> sevenfold<S>7659</S>, truly Lamech<S>3929</S> seventy<S>7657</S> and sevenfold<S>7651</S>.
And Adam<S>120</S> knew<S>3045</S> his wife<S>802</S> again<S>5750</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> a son<S>1121</S>, and called<S>7121</S> his name<S>8034</S> Seth<S>8352</S>: For God<S>430</S>, said she, hath appointed<S>7896</S> me another<S>312</S> seed<S>2233</S> instead<S>8478</S> of Abel<S>1893</S>, whom<S>3588</S> Cain<S>7014</S> slew<S>2026</S>. <sup>Seth: Heb. Sheth: that is Appointed, or, Put</sup>
And to Seth<S>8352</S>, to him<S>1931</S> also there was born<S>3205</S> a son<S>1121</S>; and he called<S>7121</S> his name<S>8034</S> Enos<S>583</S>: then began men<S>2490</S> to call<S>7121</S> upon the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>Enos: Heb. Enosh</sup> <sup>to call: or, to call themselves by the name of the Lord</sup>
